sentences.sContent: The army massacred more than 150 unarmed civilians.
sentences.sCn: 军队屠杀了150多名手无寸铁的平民。

sentences.sContent: Tens of thousands of dolphins and small whales are brutally massacred every year.
sentences.sCn: 每年有数万条海豚和小鲸鱼惨遭杀戮。

remMethod.val: mass(大批)+acre(英亩)→在一英亩的土地上杀掉大批的人→大规模屠杀

trans.tranCn: 大规模屠杀， 残杀；彻底击败
trans.tranOther: to kill a lot of people or animals in a violent way, especially when they cannot defend themselves
when a lot of people are killed violently, especially people who cannot defend themselves
